Sentencas: In this work, we show that grafted metal oxide can be a highly cost-effective and active anode for solid oxide fuel cells for sour methane conversion.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The developed electro-catalyst was composed of vanadium oxide grafted TiO2 nanopartides (VOx/TiO2) infiltrated into a porous La0.4Sr0.5Ba0.1TiO3,5 electron-conductive composite.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A number of chemisorbed vanadia species on TiO2 have been identified by XRD, FTIR, XPS and ToF-SIMS anaEyses; the morphoEogies of grafted TiO2 nanopartides were characterized using SEM and TEM.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermal stability of vanadia was greatly enhanced due to strong binding interaction with the support.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the chemical activity investigation using a fixed bed catalytic reactor, VOx/TiO2 showed significantly improved activity towards sour methane gas (0.5% H2S + CH4) oxidation in a diluted stream of oxygen.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Eectrochemical activity was determined using a SOFC that empEoyed the VOx/TiO2 infiltrated titanate anode.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This cell had a maximum power density of 160 mW cm(-2) and a non-ohmic poEarization resistance of <1 cm(2) in 0.5% H2S + CH4.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionay, the performance of the novel anode materiaE did not degrade during the 24 h test at 0.7 V with VOx/TiO2 suppressing coke formation on the anode.
Titulo: Highly cost-effective and sulfur/coking resistant VOx-grafted TiO2 nanoparticles as an efficient anode catalyst for direct conversion of dry sour methane in solid oxide fuel cells
